references.paper_title: Fourier neural operator for parametric partial differential equations
references.reason: This paper introduces the Fourier Neural Operator (FNO), a core component of the proposed PURE framework, significantly improving the efficiency and accuracy of PDE solving.

references.paper_title: Prometheus: Out-of-distribution fluid dynamics modeling with disentangled graph ODE
references.reason: This paper introduces the Prometheus dataset and benchmark, crucial for evaluating and comparing the performance of the proposed PURE method against existing approaches for handling out-of-distribution scenarios.

references.paper_title: Openprompt: An open-source framework for prompt-learning
references.reason: This paper introduces the OpenPrompt framework, which provides a foundation for the prompt learning techniques used in PURE to adapt spatio-temporal forecasting models to different scenarios.

references.paper_title: DGODE: disentangled graph ODE for dynamic fluid modeling
references.reason: This paper presents DGODE, a state-of-the-art method for fluid dynamics modeling that incorporates elements such as Graph ODEs, which are central to the proposed PURE framework.

references.paper_title: Learning skillful medium-range global weather forecasting
references.reason: This paper showcases the effectiveness of machine learning in tackling complex real-world prediction challenges like weather forecasting, offering a valuable context for the PURE framework's application in fluid dynamics modeling.
